00053 template <typename T>
00054 class persistent_ptr;
00055 
00064 class pool_base {
00065 public:
00069         pool_base() noexcept : pop(nullptr)
00070         {
00071         }
00072 
00080         explicit pool_base(pmemobjpool *cpop) noexcept : pop(cpop)
00081         {
00082         }
00083 
00087         pool_base(const pool_base &) noexcept = default;
00088 
00092         pool_base(pool_base &&) noexcept = default;
00093 
00097         pool_base &operator=(const pool_base &) noexcept = default;
00098 
00102         pool_base &operator=(pool_base &&) noexcept = default;
00103 
00107         virtual ~pool_base() noexcept = default;
00108 
00121         static pool_base
00122         open(const std::string &path, const std::string &layout)
00123         {
00124                 pmemobjpool *pop = pmemobj_open(path.c_str(), layout.c_str());
00125                 if (pop == nullptr)
00126                         throw pool_error("Failed opening pool");
00127 
00128                 return pool_base(pop);
00129         }
00130 
00147         static pool_base
00148         create(const std::string &path, const std::string &layout,
00149                std::size_t size = PMEMOBJ_MIN_POOL,
00150                mode_t mode = S_IWUSR | S_IRUSR)
00151         {
00152                 pmemobjpool *pop = pmemobj_create(path.c_str(), layout.c_str(),
00153                                                   size, mode);
00154                 if (pop == nullptr)
00155                         throw pool_error("Failed creating pool");
00156 
00157                 return pool_base(pop);
00158         }
00159 
00170         static int
00171         check(const std::string &path, const std::string &layout) noexcept
00172         {
00173                 return pmemobj_check(path.c_str(), layout.c_str());
00174         }
00175 
00181         void
00182         close()
00183         {
00184                 if (this->pop == nullptr)
00185                         throw std::logic_error("Pool already closed");
00186 
00187                 pmemobj_close(this->pop);
00188                 this->pop = nullptr;
00189         }
00190 
00197         void
00198         persist(const void *addr, size_t len) noexcept
00199         {
00200                 pmemobj_persist(this->pop, addr, len);
00201         }
00202 
00208         template <typename Y>
00209         void
00210         persist(const p<Y> &prop) noexcept
00211         {
00212                 pmemobj_persist(this->pop, &prop, sizeof(Y));
00213         }
00214 
00220         template <typename Y>
00221         void
00222         persist(const persistent_ptr<Y> &ptr) noexcept
00223         {
00224                 pmemobj_persist(this->pop, &ptr, sizeof(ptr));
00225         }

00234         flush(const void *addr, size_t len) noexcept
00235         {
00236                 pmemobj_flush(this->pop, addr, len);

00260                 pmemobj_flush(this->pop, &ptr, sizeof(ptr));

00267         drain(void) noexcept
00268         {
00269                 pmemobj_drain(this->pop);

00282         void *
00283         memcpy_persist(void *dest, const void *src, size_t len) noexcept
00284         {
00285                 return pmemobj_memcpy_persist(this->pop, dest, src, len);
00286         }
00287 
00298         void *
00299         memset_persist(void *dest, int c, size_t len) noexcept
00300         {
00301                 return pmemobj_memset_persist(this->pop, dest, c, len);
00302         }
00303 
00304         /*
00305          * Gets the C style handle to the pool.
00306          *
00307          * Necessary to be able to use the pool with the C API.
00308          *
00309          * @return pool opaque handle.
00310          */
00311         PMEMobjpool *
00312         get_handle() noexcept
00313         {
00314                 return this->pop;
00315         }
00316 
00317 protected:
00318         /* The pool opaque handle */
00319         PMEMobjpool *pop;
00320 };
00321 
00330 template <typename T>
00331 class pool : public pool_base {
00332 public:
00336         pool() noexcept = default;
00337 
00341         pool(const pool &) noexcept = default;
00342 
00346         pool(pool &&) noexcept = default;
00347 
00351         pool &operator=(const pool &) noexcept = default;
00352 
00356         pool &operator=(pool &&) noexcept = default;
00357 
00361         ~pool() noexcept = default;
00362 
00366         explicit pool(const pool_base &pb) noexcept : pool_base(pb)
00367         {
00368         }
00369 
00373         explicit pool(pool_base &&pb) noexcept : pool_base(pb)
00374         {
00375         }
00376 
00382         persistent_ptr<T>
00383         get_root()
00384         {
00385                 if (pop == nullptr)
00386                         throw pool_error("Invalid pool handle");
00387 
00388                 persistent_ptr<T> root = pmemobj_root(this->pop, sizeof(T));
00389                 return root;
00390         }
00391 
00404         static pool<T>
00405         open(const std::string &path, const std::string &layout)
00406         {
00407                 return pool<T>(pool_base::open(path, layout));
00408         }
00409 
00426         static pool<T>
00427         create(const std::string &path, const std::string &layout,
00428                std::size_t size = PMEMOBJ_MIN_POOL,
00429                mode_t mode = S_IWUSR | S_IRUSR)
00430         {
00431                 return pool<T>(pool_base::create(path, layout, size, mode));
00432         }
00433 
00444         static int
00445         check(const std::string &path, const std::string &layout)
00446         {
00447                 return pool_base::check(path, layout);
00448         }
00449 };
